lnx_dd_delete_file.company_description: Sigma is a generic and open signature format that allows you to describe relevant log events in a straight forward manner. The rule format is very flexible, easy to write and applicable to any type of log file. The main purpose of this project is to provide a structured form in which researchers or analysts can describe their once developed detection methods and make them shareable with others.

additional_context.title: Overwriting the File with Dev Zero or Null

lnx_dd_delete_file.name: Overwriting the File with Dev Zero or Null

lnx_shell_susp_commands.company_description: Sigma is a generic and open signature format that allows you to describe relevant log events in a straight forward manner. The rule format is very flexible, easy to write and applicable to any type of log file. The main purpose of this project is to provide a structured form in which researchers or analysts can describe their once developed detection methods and make them shareable with others.
lnx_shell_susp_commands.description: Detects suspicious shell commands used in various exploit codes (see references)

additional_context.search: ("wget * - http* | perl" OR "wget * - http* | sh" OR "wget * - http* | bash" OR "python -m SimpleHTTPServer" OR "-m http.server" OR "import pty; pty.spawn*" OR "socat exec:*" OR "socat -O /tmp/*" OR "socat tcp-connect*" OR "*echo binary >>*" OR "*wget *; chmod +x*" OR "*wget *; chmod 777 *" OR "*cd /tmp || cd /var/run || cd /mnt*" OR "*stop;service iptables stop;*" OR "*stop;SuSEfirewall2 stop;*" OR "chmod 777 2020*" OR "*>>/etc/rc.local" OR "*base64 -d /tmp/*" OR "* | base64 -d *" OR "*/chmod u+s *" OR "*chmod +s /tmp/*" OR "*chmod u+s /tmp/*" OR "* /tmp/haxhax*" OR "* /tmp/ns_sploit*" OR "nc -l -p *" OR "cp /bin/ksh *" OR "cp /bin/sh *" OR "* /tmp/*.b64 *" OR "*/tmp/ysocereal.jar*" OR "*/tmp/x *" OR "*; chmod +x /tmp/*" OR "*;chmod +x /tmp/*")
additional_context.title: Suspicious Activity in Shell Commands

lnx_shell_susp_commands.name: Suspicious Activity in Shell Commands

lnx_susp_ssh.company_description: Sigma is a generic and open signature format that allows you to describe relevant log events in a straight forward manner. The rule format is very flexible, easy to write and applicable to any type of log file. The main purpose of this project is to provide a structured form in which researchers or analysts can describe their once developed detection methods and make them shareable with others.
lnx_susp_ssh.description: Detects suspicious SSH / SSHD error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts

additional_context.search: ("*unexpected internal error*" OR "*unknown or unsupported key type*" OR "*invalid certificate signing key*" OR "*invalid elliptic curve value*" OR "*incorrect signature*" OR "*error in libcrypto*" OR "*unexpected bytes remain after decoding*" OR "*fatal: buffer_get_string: bad string*" OR "*Local: crc32 compensation attack*" OR "*bad client public DH value*" OR "*Corrupted MAC on input*")
additional_context.title: Suspicious SSHD Error

lnx_susp_ssh.name: Suspicious SSHD Error

lnx_shell_clear_cmd_history.company_description: Sigma is a generic and open signature format that allows you to describe relevant log events in a straight forward manner. The rule format is very flexible, easy to write and applicable to any type of log file. The main purpose of this project is to provide a structured form in which researchers or analysts can describe their once developed detection methods and make them shareable with others.
lnx_shell_clear_cmd_history.description: Clear command history in linux which is used for defense evasion.

additional_context.search: ("rm *bash_history" OR "echo \"\" > *bash_history" OR "cat /dev/null > *bash_history" OR "ln -sf /dev/null *bash_history" OR "truncate -s0 *bash_history" OR "export HISTFILESIZE=0" OR "history -c" OR "history -w" OR "shred *bash_history")
additional_context.title: Clear Command History

lnx_shell_clear_cmd_history.name: Clear Command History

lnx_buffer_overflows.company_description: Sigma is a generic and open signature format that allows you to describe relevant log events in a straight forward manner. The rule format is very flexible, easy to write and applicable to any type of log file. The main purpose of this project is to provide a structured form in which researchers or analysts can describe their once developed detection methods and make them shareable with others.
lnx_buffer_overflows.description: Detects buffer overflow attempts in Unix system log files

additional_context.search: ("attempt to execute code on stack by" OR "FTP LOGIN FROM .* 0bin0sh" OR "rpc.statd[\\d+]: gethostbyname error for" OR "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA")
additional_context.title: Buffer Overflow Attempts

lnx_buffer_overflows.name: Buffer Overflow Attempts
